changeSet.insert: <column name="report_sql" value="select o.name as Office, cvl.code_value as 'Client Location', c.external_id as UID, concat(c.firstname,' ',c.lastname) as 'Customer Name', l.account_no as 'Loan Id Number', l.principal_amount as 'Loan Amount', l.interest_charged_derived as Interest, l.term_frequency as 'Total Payments', l.principal_repaid_derived as 'Total Principal Paid', l.fee_charges_repaid_derived as 'Total Fees Paid', l.interest_repaid_derived as 'Total Interest Paid', 0.0 as 'Total Late Fees', l.total_outstanding_derived as 'Outstanding Balance', l.interest_outstanding_derived as 'Outstanding Interest', l.fee_charges_outstanding_derived as 'Outstanding Fees', cvs.code_value as 'Client Classification', case when l.loan_status_id = 100 then 'Pending Approval' when l.loan_status_id = 200 then 'Approval' when l.loan_status_id = 300 then 'Active' when l.loan_status_id = 303 then 'Transfer In Progress' when l.loan_status_id = 304 then 'Transfer On Hold' when l.loan_status_id = 400 then 'Withdrawn By Client' when l.loan_status_id = 500 then 'Rejected' when l.loan_status_id = 600 then 'Closed Obligations Met' when l.loan_status_id = 601 then 'Closed Written Off' when l.loan_status_id = 602 then 'Closed Reschedule Outstanding Amount' when l.loan_status_id = 700 then 'Overpaid' end as 'Status', YEAR(now()) - YEAR(c.date_of_birth) as Age, cvg.code_value as Gender, cvc.code_value as Cohort, l.loan_counter as Cycle, cvn.code_value as Nationality, '' as Location from m_office o join m_office ounder on ounder.hierarchy like concat(o.hierarchy, '%') and ounder.hierarchy like concat('.', '%') join m_client c on c.office_id = ounder.id join m_loan l on l.client_id = c.id join m_product_loan pl on pl.id = l.product_id left join m_client_other_info coi on coi.client_id = c.id left join m_client_recruitment_survey crs on crs.client_id = c.id left join m_code_value cvl on cvl.id = crs.survey_location_cv_id left join m_code_value cvs on cvs.id = coi.strata_cv_id left join m_code_value cvg on cvg.id = c.gender_cv_id left join m_code_value cvc on cvc.id = crs.cohort_cv_id left join m_code_value cvn on cvn.id = coi.nationality_cv_id left join m_fund f on f.id = l.fund_id left join m_staff lo on lo.id = l.loan_officer_id where o.id = ${officeId} and (l.product_id = "${loanProductId}" or "-1" = "${loanProductId}") and (l.fund_id = "${fundId}" or "-1" = "${fundId}") and (ifnull(l.loan_officer_id, -10) = "${loanOfficerId}" or "-1" = "${loanOfficerId}") and (l.disbursedon_date >= "${startDate}" and l.disbursedon_date < "${endDate}") and (c.id = "${clientId}" or "-1" = "${clientId}") "/>
